title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.3, Phi-4, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, embed, pull, push, create, list, copy, delete, show, ps.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama: same feature parity as Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package integrating Ollama models into LangChain LLM, Chat, Embeddings interfaces.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now renamed Open WebUI); supports RAG, multimodal, admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and tool support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based CLI that wraps Ollama with ergonomic commands and config profiles.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement inside VS Code.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function-calling, structured output, Vision, RAG, fine-tune, Docker Compose stacks.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama: chat, embed, pull, list, delete with native streaming support.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama with generated types and streaming helpers.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stack: Ollama + Open WebUI + GPU support + nginx.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selector.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama supporting .NET 6+ and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension that adds a side-panel chat powered by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-rag-langchain-streamlit
summary: Template repo for building a local RAG chatbot with Ollama, LangChain, Chroma, and Streamlit.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated list of custom Modelfiles (Llava, CodeLlama, SQL, French, etc.) ready for ollama create.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models to your server with slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-mistral-finetune
summary: End-to-end repo showing how to fine-tune Mistral-7B and serve it with Ollama using LoRA and MLX.
